summary: A drama focused on the friendship between a high-functioning autistic woman and a man who is traumatized after a fatal car accident.
cast: Alan Rickman|Emily Hampshire|Jackie Brown|Callum Keith Rennie|Scott Wickware|Johnny Goltz|James Allodi|Janet van de Graaf|Carrie-Anne Moss|Julie Stewart|Sigourney Weaver|Charlie|Selina Cadell|Nia Roberts|Dov Tiefenbach|David Fox|Jayne Eastwood|John Bayliss|Jackie Laidlaw|Susan Coyne|Robert Smith Jones|Samantha Hayes|Mark McKinney
title: Snow Cake
